categories: Category:Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2

nodes.text: Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 5

Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 5 is the fifth issue of the Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 published by De Agostini. It came with the central head bearing for the build-able R2-D2 and contained the articles "Filming R2-D2, Part 2", "R2-series astromech droids, Part 1" and "LEDS: Light Emitting Diodes".
